Mestel was an old and powerful merchant organization and a noble family from the city of Arrabar in the Vilhon Reach
House Mestel was one of the oldest and most powerful merchant families of Arrabar. The oldest families held nine-tenth of the citys wealth while the younger merchant houses, such as House Matrell, fought for the one-tenth share of the market. The estate of the Mestel family was a sprawling high-spired mansion surrounded by a grove of suth trees planted along the estates perimeter. Like all other mercantile houses of Arrabar, Mestels housed a sizable mercenary and guard force.
Obiron Matrell was born in the  to one of the lordlings of the great Mestel family of Arrabar. Even after Obiron, along with his wife Hetta, built a small merchant empire, House Matrell was still looked down upon by Mestels.
In the , Falagh Mestel became involved in a plot against House Matrell.
